channel.title: Mdfind on warrick.io
channel.description: Recent content in Mdfind on warrick.io

item.title: mdfind
item.description: I frequently use Spotlight, and I was pleasantly surprised to discover it has a command-line complement, mdfind. % mdfind sniffer.pdf /Users/warrick/Desktop/sniffers/sniffer.pdf /Users/warrick/CSCI/CSCI 6760 S12/presentations/sniffers/sniffer.
